about_the_game:
Cavescape is a co-op survival adventure game with one of the most fun mechanics around: Grappling Hooks! You play as Fred, a miner on a mission to make it back up the cave to be reunited with his best friend, Rocky the puppy, who was violently taken from him by Gorgath, the big ugly worm monster.

Core Features:

- Fully Destructible Environment

Almost everything in Cavescape can be destroyed, which means you can either use this to your advantage or troll your friends and make your way up the cave even more challenging!

- Checkpoints

As you make your way up the cave, you will find checkpoints that you can either claim to allow you to respawn, or destroy for some serious cash that can be used to upgrade your weapon. Are you brave enough to trade them for cash and risk dying on your way up? Or do you want to play it safe and fight the monsters with less powerful weapons, the choice is yours...

- Procedurally Generated Caves

All caves in Cavescape are procedurally generated to ensure that every adventure is a unique experience. No two cave explorations are the same, giving you endless replayability and a new challenge every time you play!

- Grappling Hooks

Last but not least, we have grappling hooks, which you can combine with your tools to create unique weapons to help you out of the cave. Whether you combine a pickaxe with a grappling hook or a shotgun, each combination unlocks new possibilities and gameplay mechanics for endless fun and new ways to mess with your friends!

So what are you waiting for? Hit that WISHLIST button with your cave mate and dive into a new, unique adventure from June 2025.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent DX11 GPU

short_description: Escape a procedurally generated cave by grappling and swinging. Explore the depths of the ecosystem, fight foreign creatures, and upgrade your tools. Destructible environments, deep mechanics, and tough bosses!
